comment: Well bowled champ. You tried your best 🔥but it just wasn't our day today. ❤️
Koi baat nhi sirji...come back stronger....❤️
Ignore these comments champ. It's just a game. Good luck for FINALS.❤️🇮🇳
Genuine India Fans won't say anything bad! They'll support the players in bad times. I SUPPORT YOU SHAMI👏👏
Please dont post unwanted comments.. Anything can happen it's a game .. Stop hating him 💔🙏🏻🙏🏻

aa rahe honge shami ko anti national bolne wale.......yad karo ye wahi shami ha jo apne team players ke lie champiosn trophy final harne ke bad akele pakistani aggresive fans se lad gaya tha......kisi ke religion ke uske charachter ko judge karne walo asli gaddar to tum ho
The captain gave it all, the team gave it all, just a game where the opposition played well, heads up boys, we need to win the world cup. We are with you. 🙌
All the best bro for today match
Please don't abuse anybody guys there is many more matches ahead 🙏
